column1: Little Goat Diner////There was a little confusion re: drinks--I ordered the bloody mary
column4: and then when we pointed out the miscommunication
column5: it took like 15 minutes for his mimosa to arrive (much to our server's confusion as well). That little blip in service aside
column6: the bloody mary was PHENOMENAL. The kimchi really adds an interesting and unique flavor and I was loving every sip. The coffee was also great.
